author: David Fischer
title: ‘The Wizard of Lies’ Teaser Reveals Robert De Niro as Bernie Madoff
text:
Not only does HBO’s long-awaited Bernie Madoff movie now has a trailer, that you can watch here above, it stars none other than Robert De Niro as the Ponzi scheme mastermind who stole billions of USD from investors. De Niro is in his first-ever HBO role with the film. It was directed by Barry Levinson and costars Michelle Pfeiffer as Ruth Madoff.
The project is based on the 2012 book The Wizard of Lies: Bernie Madoff and the Death of Trust by New York Times journalist Diana B. Henriques. Wizard of Lies premieres in May. Watch the teaser trailer now here above.
